storage-facilities-description: Comprehensive storage facility for oil and gas operations including: (1) Crude oil storage - 2 x 100,000 barrel insulated tanks with floating roof design, vapor recovery system, and fire suppression; (2) Diesel fuel storage - 75,000 litre double-wall tank with automatic leak detection; (3) Chemical storage - segregated storage areas for acids, bases, and solvents with appropriate compatibility groupings; (4) Gas storage - compressed natural gas cylinders in secure, ventilated housing. All facilities include 24/7 monitoring, emergency response equipment, and are designed to exceed current environmental protection standards.
